description.name: opoptimism
description.tagline: Optimism optimism Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto optimism-op Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Optimism optimism directly on your website
Unique optimism/op receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your optimism/op wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
